alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 7:38PM EDT until June 16 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/. * At 737 PM EDT/637 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blountstown, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Orange, Bristol, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Red Hill, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Estiffanulga, Lewis, Woods and Hugh Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
